post.text: The mainstream media (MSM) are trying to rig this election in order to advance their liberal, far left agenda for another 4 years and beyond.  Crooked Hillary Clinton has been the mouthpiece for the corrupt Washington DC system that the MSM keeps alive through direct propaganda and support.  It is time we bring CHANGE to the White House, defeat the rigged system, and Make America Great Again!

comment.author: Jace
comment.text: Btw Trump supporters Hillary Clinton won the 2nd debate & showed AMERICAN citizens what discussing plans for the future of our country! Where were you when bush & Cheney destroyed email? It's okay for you to dish it but don't want to hear when GOP does it! Also what party is supporting Trump now? From what I hear it's NOT the GOP!

replies.author: Rebekkah
replies.text: Why did you feel the desperate need to make a fool of yourself on Donald's page?

replies.author: Jace
replies.text: No just stating the facts & the truth! Are you trying to say bush & Cheney didn't destroy emails? GOP is in free fall & bailing more each day!

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: She was under investigation troll. Subpoenaed then destroyed the emails that were asked for. Lied to FBI and Congress. Martha Stewart went behind bars for far less. She is a trader for arming ISIS.

replies.author: Cole
replies.text: Who cares about the GOP? Trump exposes their hypocrisy too. The Republicans and Democrats are two sides of the same coin. They are both corrupt and need to be seriously reformed. Trump is already reforming the Republicans. Whoever refuses to support Trump from the GOP will be on their way out because the voters pay attention. Meanwhile, Hillary perfectly represents the establishment, which is why so many corrupt Congresspeople from both parties support her. Their time of trampling on the American people is coming to an end.
